class Solution(object):
    def largestSumAfterKNegations(self, A, K):
        """
        :type A: List[int]
        :type K: int
        :rtype: int
        """
        A.sort()
        i = 0
        while i < len(A) and K > 0 and A[i] < 0:
            A[i] = -A[i]
            i += 1
            K -= 1
        if K % 2 == 1:
            A.sort()
            A[0] = -A[0]
        return sum(A)
